title: New game mode idea..
body:
A round map   , everyone starts level 1 with  20k gold. 
BUT everyone has 5k hp  
and the team who scores 200 kills wins .

replies.body:
I have one... kinda out there though.

Two teams of 100 people. Map is kinda like SR but much. Teams have 1 leader, 5 captains 10 builders, and 84 soldiers. Soldiers have 3 health, no skills, all have the same attack range and speed, and their health works like ward health where it is three hits and you are dead. Captains have their basic skills and 5 health bar units. Leaders have their full champion abilities and 10 health bar units. Builders only have 2 health units and a slightly lower range than Soldiers, but they can build structures.

For skills each health bar is 100 health and there are no items for anybody. Gold goes to a team pool and is used by builders to build wards (which are large, visible, and destroyable) and turrets, (which are larger and have additional skills to help them fight multiple opponents), and maybe siege weapons of some sort.

Captains and builders stay dead longer than soldiers, and leaders stay dead for even longer than them. Maybe leaders, builders, and captains could cost gold to return to play or something.
seems nice ! but 200 people in 1 game would be laggy/buggy AF !

After I wrote it I reread it and said to myself, "That is just a crappier Fantasy Earth Zero." XD

Fantasy Earth Zero was a sort of battlefield mmorpg with early ps2 era graphics on pc, it got shut down in the US though because the company that had the rights to it sucked XD

Anyway, it could be somewhat laggy if the other players had garbage internet, but with Riot's server side hitboxes it might be doable if the north american internet infrastructure didn't suck.
